title: An hour in the corporation bus: Tiny Tales #2
description: Everybodyâ€™s definition of enjoyment and good life is different. People generally tend to compare themselves again the better rivals, but hardly ever with less privileged ones.A small thirty minutes ride brings about a big change in Bindiya's attitude towards life.We take our lives for granted. We always think that our life is full of problems. We always compare ourselves.For more books, please visit the author page.https://www.amazon.com/author/shabana...
